htmlMetaDescription: lets you connect and control IoT devices using Amazon Eco Dot, Google Home or Sinric Pro Android app for free
htmlTitle: Sinric Pro - Connect Amazon Alexa, Google Home with esp8266, esp32, raspberry pi
title: Home automation for everyone
subtitle: Simple way to control your IOT development boards like RaspberryPi, ESP8226, ESP32 or Arduino with Amazon Alexa, Google Home or SmartThings
signupForYourVeryOwn: Sign up for your very own Sinric Pro account. It is easy and free.
downloadExampleCodeFrom: Download example code from Githb repo and change WiFi, device id and credentials
dragAndDropCapabilitiesThatDescribe: Drag and drop capabilities that describe the features of your IoT device and build your very own device type and generate the code automatically.
DoYouWantToHaveYourOwnSmartHome: Do you want to have your own SmartHome IoT platform with your own brand with almost no effort?
OurPaaSSolutionsAreTailored: Our PaaS solutions are tailored for startups to accelerate the time to market and make dramatic cost savings. You can Focus on building your business and let us manage your IoT platform.
ToGetStartedWithPaaS: To get started with PaaS on Sinric Pro, Contact us below.
useTheSinricProApp: Use the Sinric Pro App, Alexa Skill, Google Action, IFTTT or build your own using the APIs.
itTakesLessThan: It takes less than 5 mins to setup
step1CreateAnAccount: Step 1: Create an account and login
Step3DownloadTheExample: Step 3: Download the example code from
Step4ControlUsingApp: Step 4: Control using app, Alexa, Google Home, IFTTT or API

readyToGetStarted: Ready to get started? Sign up now!
